description:
The globally beloved aardvark makes his digital debut! Arthur celebrates his 35th publishing anniversary and 15th year on television with the release of the ARTHUR READS app series, narrated by Marc Brown, creator of Arthur. Brought to you by ScrollMotion Kids and Marc Brown Studios, ARTHUR TURNS GREEN is the first app in the series. 

"It all started with kids, teachers and librarians," said Marc Brown, who worked side-by-side with award-winning developer ScrollMotion Kids to transform classic and new Arthur stories into digital reading experiences. ARTHUR TURNS GREEN combines everything you love about Arthur, reading, and the interactivity of your HP TouchPad to bring you an unparalleled new experience.

ARTHUR TURNS GREEN: When Arthur comes home from school acting suspicious and talking about a Big Green Machine, D.W. begins to worry. What is this machine? And why are Arthur’s hands turning green? 

ARTHUR TURNS GREEN was published in 2011 and was an immediate New York Times bestseller. 

► Narrated by creator Marc Brown
► Illustrated Table of Contents - Instantly jump to your favorite page. 
► Page Flow - Swipe forward and back to move around the illustrations in tandem with the text. 


ABOUT MARC BROWN: Marc Brown is the creator of Arthur, the beloved aardvark celebrating his 35th anniversary in publishing and 15th anniversary on television. Since 1976 more than 65 million Arthur books have been sold in the US alone. Marc Brown's newest Arthur title, ARTHUR TURNS GREEN, was published in 2011 and was an immediate New York Times bestseller. Marc Brown is also creator and executive producer of the award-winning PBS Arthur animated TV series ARTHUR and the illustrator of the New York Times bestseller, WILD ABOUT BOOKS. 

ABOUT SCROLLMOTION KIDS: ScrollMotion Kids helps families discover new ways to learn and play, combining your favorite childhood stories with the wonder of digital interactivity. To find out more, please visit www.scrollmotionkids.com
